channel.title: I Need Expierenced Help :(
channel.description:
hey every1 when i try and run a client the command prompt window automatically shuts or it says alot of wierd shit. its different for nearly every client. i can compile the clients but i cant run them. i can also compile and run sources perfectly.
could som1 help me please?

item.title: I Need Expierenced Help :(

item.description:

ah k, cheers anyway man
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 31, 2008, 11:47:38 pm[/size][hr]oh btw there is a client called webbers client, i can run that perfectly but no other clients

yer ill copy and paste them.

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;

item.title: I Need Expierenced Help :(
item.dc:creator: @Mop_U_Up Mop U Up
item.description:
@Mop_U_Up wrote:

thx for ur help man but it didnt work.

@echo off
color 0a
title HoldenScape
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

i changed the Xmx512m too Xmx1000m and it still automatically closes.

Read full topic
